reviews.text: It was amazing. Maria was such a great wage service with a movie. I would recommend this place 10 out of 10. I‚Äôm done coming back but atmosphere is amazing. Everything was great.

This restaurant attracts the in-crowd. The team demonstrates true service values. The mood reflects aims, workers are involved, and you feel you've found somewhere special downtown. The flavors were memorable. This place offers food quality I'd almost forgotten existed.

Mejor de los Colombianos visitado hoy por tres mamis Dominicanas . Quedamos encantadas con la comida , el servicio de Christian Mar√≠n , Lady y Carolina . Excelente servicio. Volveremos . Recomendado 100% por siento .

Adem√°s, el tiempo de espera fue razonable y los precios son justos para la calidad del servicio y los productos que ofrecen.

Recomiendo este restaurante sin dudarlo. Volveremos muy pronto.

What an amazing place to eat!  Food and service was the best.  Everyone was so nice and made us feel welcome. I highly recommend

The food is PHENOMENAL, the music is perfect, the food is delicious and the service is even better!! We were taken care of by Anyi who was a great waitress. All the food was on time and she was very attentive! I definitely recommend this to all of my visiting friends and family.

Enjoyed the small family atmosphere for lunch to celebrate a family birthday and it‚Äôs mainly suitable for a small crowd (4-6) given the size of the establishment is limited but it does have outside seating.

The food serving was tremendously delicious adorned with a small Colombian flag but the best service was provided by Leydi as she served with kindness and hospitality‚Ä¶ and very attentive to our needs. We were the only ones eating at that but nonetheless she was one of the best servers I‚Äôve encountered. The tip at 18% of consumption is included with the final bill.

One caveat is parking as located in a residential area and 3-4 blocks away from 7 train but overall, the restaurant size is small but huge in taste and quality.

Visited for morning Breakfast.
Small friendly location. Close to authentic calentando. Had the Calentando with Steak, Arepa with cheese and huevos Perico. The meat was well seasoned but the arepa was over cooked and quite hard to eat. Unfortunately no refills with the coffee. There was also no mention of the pre added tip of 18% which is not an issue. But I would not have tipped almost 40% as a tip for breakfast for mediocre service. Blindsided to be charged such a ridiculous amount with no liquor for breakfast. Feel like I was nickel and dimed.
Delicious food, courteous staff. We got the platter and margarita. So good.
Very good experience, accessible price, very good customer service. Definitely, I would be coming back
I love this food, the best Colombian food in NYC, the servers Sara and Angie were attending to us, Cristian owner place it‚Äôs a great person and friendly, I recommend this restaurant 100%

This place was recommended by a friend and it was spot on even better than expected. I was welcomed by Christian and attended by Carolina. First, I had a delicious hot coffee while I decided what to order. Secondly, I went with the arepa, steak and eggs, which were prepared to my exact temperature request. The service was welcoming and friendly. I loved the ambience, the tvs played games and music was just right. I‚Äôll definitely come back when I‚Äôm in town.

Para√≠so was so good.  We ordered a bandeja paisa that was incredible.  It had so much food and a great presentation.  Ordered a limonada and a limonada de coco that was a must try. The waitress, Leidy, was so friendly with us.  I would definitely come back.
